attributes.action: how to tax the poor to save the rich
attributes.additional_details: i am a pensioner with an income of approx £13,000 a year.all taxed at source by p.a.y.e. i want all tax avoidance,evasion.and all creative accounting by the better off, the rich and the greedy beyond avarice put on an even keel with people like me,a lot of them much worse off. the time has come to stop the madness of the few taking all.if britain does not take this opportunity to change we may be lost.for decades.
